name: Child Abuse Simulator
description:
Beat the Children:

Beat em with

  • A Belt
  • A Shovel
  • GAT THEM
  • A Single Grain of Rice
  • And the COBRA HAWK FIRE SWORD

Beat the

  • Goth Kid
  • Cowboy Kid
  • Rich Kid

Summon things to beat them

  • A Tiger
  • Fire
  • A Demon from the Depths of Hell

And even more BEATING tools
